task.title: How to Configure an IBM DB2 Data Source

taskbody.prereq: Available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: The steps for configuring a data source for connecting to an IBM DB2 server are as follows:

step.cmd: Click the New button in the Data Sources panel.

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a data source is opened.

fig.title: Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box
Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box

step.cmd: Enter a unique name for the data source.
Select DB2 in the driver Type drop-down list.
Add the driver files for IBM DB2 using the Add Files button.

info.p: The IBM DB2 driver files are:
The Driver files section lists download links for database drivers that are necessary for accessing IBM DB2 databases in .

step.cmd: Select the most appropriate Driver class.
Click the OK button to finish the data source configuration.

taskbody.result: To watch our video demonstration about running XQuery against an IBM DB2 Pure XML database, go to http://www.oxygenxml.com/demo/DB2.html.
